read_directory=aligned_reads_SNS2020_Tb927-62_bowtie2                      
# path to aligned reads

output_dir=StrandSpecific_norrowPeaks_RNASE_p005_Tb927-62  
# output directory name (generated by the sript in the working directory)

file_prefix=aln-pe_Tb927-62_sorted_reheadered_dups-removed                   
# prefix of mapped reads ($sample$prefix.bam)

input_list=("9")      
# sample name as found in bam files 

overlap_list=(50)                                                  
# peak overlap to be excluded

window_list=(500)                                       
# window size for peak pair selection

with_control=true
